metadata.source: Web research (DuckDuckGo, Yahoo, direct site scraping)
metadata.criteria: 200+ units, mid-rise/high-rise preferred, Henderson/Enterprise/Spring Valley/Summerlin, 2024-2026 construction
metadata.notes: PEOPLE score = People + Enclosure + Openness + Proximity + Leverage + Economic (max 10 each, max 60 total). All rental apartments unless noted. Contact info is developer/corporate level — property-level contacts require in-person visit or leasing office call.

leads.name: Elysian at The District
leads.notes: Green Valley Ranch, Henderson — TIER 1 location. Luxury apartments + townhomes. Right in the heart of Henderson's best retail/dining district. 360 units with elevator/lobby access. Calida Group HQ: 10777 W. Twain Ave., Suite 115, LV 89135. Pop-in at leasing office first.

leads.name: Capella at Symphony Park
leads.address: NW corner Promenade Place & Symphony Park Ave, Las Vegas, NV 89106
leads.building_type: high-rise (22 stories) — FIRST all-for-rent high-rise in Las Vegas
leads.notes: UNICORN — LV's first all-rental HIGH-RISE. 22 stories. $50M construction loan from Bank Hapoalim. Mixed-use with retail. Single elevator path to all units = PERFECT placement opportunity. Symphony Park is downtown but a premium cultural district. Builder: T.B. Penick & Sons. Contact SLC corporate for vendor approval process. This is a career-defining placement if secured.

leads.name: Bria at Symphony Park
leads.address: Adjacent to Capella, Symphony Park, Las Vegas, NV 89106
leads.notes: Sister property to Capella. 275 units, studios to 1-bed. Combined with Capella = 547 luxury units in one campus. Same developer, same vendor approval process. Pitch both properties together for maximum leverage. Mid-rise with single-entry design.

leads.name: Elysian at Fort Apache (384-unit)
leads.address: Fort Apache Rd area, Las Vegas, NV 89148 (Spring Valley)
leads.notes: LARGE 384-unit project under construction. Spring Valley location = Tier 2. Same Calida Group developer — build relationship through existing completed properties (District, Tivoli, etc.) to get early access here. Wrap-around mid-rise design with parking garage = single entry path.

leads.name: Elysian at Sunset
leads.address: 8150 Rafael Rivera Way, Las Vegas, NV 89113
leads.developer: The Calida Group (sold to Faring, West Hollywood CA)
leads.property_manager: Unknown (new owner Faring may change PM)
leads.notes: 384 units, 90%+ occupied at time of sale. Between Buffalo & Durango near 215 Beltway = Enterprise/SW area Tier 2. New owner Faring (LA-based) may be receptive to new amenity vendors. $307K/unit sale price = Class A luxury. 9,000 sq ft clubhouse with arcade, billiards, massage rooms. Approach new PM team as 'new vendor for new ownership era'.

leads.name: Ely at Fort Apache
leads.address: Fort Apache Rd area, Spring Valley, Las Vegas, NV
leads.notes: Spring Valley = Tier 2. NOW LEASING with aggressive specials (2 months free + $2K gift card) = lease-up phase, management focused on attracting residents. Perfect timing — they WANT amenities to differentiate. 'Ely' brand = slightly lower price point than 'Elysian' but still luxury.

leads.name: Elysian at Rainbow
leads.address: 6775 W Badura Ave, Las Vegas, NV 89118
leads.notes: SW Las Vegas near Downtown Summerlin. NOW LEASING with 10 WEEKS FREE. Lease-up phase = desperate for amenities. 336 units. Resort-style pool, clubhouse, fire pit. Near 215 Beltway. Tier 2-3 location but large unit count makes it worthwhile.

leads.name: Elysian at Tivoli
leads.notes: Summerlin = Tier 3 (25-35 min from base). 359 units, luxury. Near 50+ restaurants and shopping. Offering 1 month free = still in lease-up. Worth the drive for 359 units of luxury demographic. 'If you set foot on the grounds you may think you're not in Kansas anymore.'

leads.name: Elysian at Hughes Center
leads.address: Hughes Center area, Las Vegas, NV 89169
leads.building_type: mid-rise (two 7-story buildings wrapping parking garages, Sky Lounge)
leads.notes: CONFIRMED MID-RISE: Two 7-story buildings, 242 + 126 units = 368 total. Built by Martin-Harris Construction. On 6 acres. Sky Lounge with kitchen, golf simulator, game room. Hughes Center = Paradise/Tier 2. Likely stabilized by now but still relatively new. Check if they have existing vending.

leads.name: Elysian at The Palms
leads.address: Near I-15/Flamingo area, Las Vegas, NV
leads.building_type: mid-rise (7+ stories, rooftop playground, 12,000 sq ft clubhouse)
leads.notes: 7th floor views of Strip mentioned in reviews. 12,000 sq ft clubhouse, rooftop playground. Near I-15 with Strip views = Paradise area Tier 2. Offering 6 weeks free rent = may still be filling. Hugh Hefner-themed mailroom wallpaper. Unique property personality. 285 units.

leads.name: Elysian at Flamingo
leads.notes: 360 units in Flamingo/Paradise corridor. Tier 2 location. Part of Calida Group's massive LV portfolio. If you secure a vendor relationship with Calida Group corporate, you gain access to ALL their properties (15+ in LV, 6,000+ units). This is the Greystar-level play.

leads.name: EVORA
leads.address: S Buffalo Dr & W Patrick Ln, Las Vegas, NV 89113
leads.building_type: mixed-use (residential + 240K sq ft commercial, subterranean parking)
leads.notes: MASSIVE MIXED-USE UNICORN — 42 acres, 1,343 residential units + 240K sq ft commercial. Designed by Safdie Rabines Architects. 1.5-acre public plaza. Multi-level lofts available. SW Las Vegas near Spring Valley = Tier 2. Studios through 3-bed + loft units. This is the biggest single development opportunity in the valley. Multiple machine placements possible across phases. Has yoga studio, co-work spaces, sky lounge.

leads.name: FORA
leads.building_type: mid-rise (4 stories, Sky Lounge on top floor)
leads.notes: 220 units, 4-story with top-floor Sky Lounge with Strip views. Enterprise area = Tier 2. Holistic wellness focus — residents are health-conscious professionals. Package Concierge Service already exists (good sign they care about amenities). Co-work offices = professionals working from home during day. EV charging stations = affluent demographic.

leads.name: Tuscan Highlands
leads.address: 12656 Southern Highlands Pkwy, Las Vegas, NV 89141
leads.building_type: mid-rise (luxury, The Cove at Southern Highlands)
leads.developer: Unknown (likely Olympia Companies or Southern Highlands developer)
leads.notes: 304 units in Southern Highlands master plan. Health-forward community with wellness coaches, nutrition planners, yoga teachers. 'Social, health-forward haven like no other.' Studios, 1 & 2 bedrooms starting at $1,425. Southern Highlands = Tier 1-2. Near Exploration Peak Park. Need to confirm building type (mid-rise vs garden). Visit to verify.

leads.name: The Watermark
leads.building_type: mid-rise (7 stories) — MIXED-USE with retail + office
leads.notes: ⚠️ BELOW 200-unit threshold (151 units) but included because: (1) 7-story MIXED-USE in DOWNTOWN HENDERSON = unicorn building type, (2) 25,950 sq ft retail + 12,500 sq ft office = extra foot traffic, (3) Across from Henderson City Hall and Silver Knights arena, (4) TIER 1 LOCATION — walking distance from West Henderson base, (5) Recovered from bankruptcy, fresh start = very open to new vendors. Rooftop pool, 24/7 fitness, Strip views. Studios from $1,050. Potential revenue from both residents AND office/retail workers.

leads.name: Ainsley at 3900 (Pre-Construction)
leads.address: 3900 Paradise Rd area, Las Vegas, NV
leads.notes: 385 units, pre-construction. Paradise area near airport corridor = Tier 2. Third 'Ainsley' brand property (socially conscious, wellness-focused). Adjacent to 3900 Paradise Park (under renovations). If you build a relationship with Calida Group NOW through their existing properties, you'll be first in line when this opens. Long-term play.

leads.name: The Presley
leads.notes: 200 units, 7-story mid-rise, market rate. Located in Las Vegas Medical District near Alta Dr. Estimated value $19M. Planning stage, starts in 4-12 months. Medical District location means potential foot traffic from nearby medical workers. Future lead — track construction start.

strategic_notes.calida_group_master_play: The Calida Group / Elysian Living is THE dominant developer in Las Vegas multifamily. They have 15+ properties in LV totaling 6,000+ units across all stages. Securing a corporate-level vendor relationship with Calida Group unlocks access to ALL properties — under construction, pre-construction, and completed. HQ: 10777 W. Twain Ave., Suite 115, Las Vegas NV 89135. Phone: 702-947-2000. Co-founders: Douglas Eisner, Eric Cohen. This is the #1 strategic priority. They likely need NetVendor or similar vendor management platform — check before approaching.
strategic_notes.southern_land_company: Southern Land Company (Nashville HQ) is building LV's first all-rental high-rise. They self-manage properties and have high standards. Capella + Bria = 547 luxury units opening Summer 2025. Getting in before opening is the play. Phone: 615-970-6222.
strategic_notes.market_timing: Las Vegas absorbed ~13,000 new apartments from Jan 2023 to Apr 2025. Pipeline is contracting (3,904 units under construction Q3 2025, down 49%). New construction starts slowed 25% in Q1 2025. This means: (1) properties opening now are in lease-up mode and desperate for amenities, (2) new supply will tighten, meaning existing new builds will reach full occupancy and stabilize = steady revenue for vending.
strategic_notes.approach_strategy: For properties in lease-up (offering free rent specials): pitch vending as a FREE amenity that helps attract/retain residents. For completed/stabilized: pitch the $54/unit rent premium and passive rev share income. For pre-construction: build developer relationship NOW for guaranteed placement at opening.
